page.title: 04LEISURE
page.content: In my spare time I usually play outside at the park or I play pressgangs with Kay, Gary, Louise, Lee, Tony, Dale, Justin and Claire.When my grandad has some spare time he plays golf with his friend Kieth.He plays golf on a Monday, Sunday and Wednesday.The idea of golf is to pot a golfball into a hole on the course in the lowest number of hits possible.If you do this in one they say it is a hole in one and you get the most points.My grandma doesn't have much spare time because of her job but when she has some she likes to knit or sew a picture,she also likes to make dresses and skirts.When I am at my dads house we go motor bike racing he is number fifty six.He's got lots of trophies and one cup.To ride the bike you need a skilled passenger and be good at controling the bike.
